amendatorysection.catchline: Verification of security interest; seller; duty.
amendatorysection.para: In order to verify the existence or nonexistence of a security interest, a buyer, commission merchant, or selling agent may request a seller to disclose such seller's social security number or approved unique identifier or, in the case of a seller doing business other than as an individual, the Internal Revenue Service taxpayer identification number or approved unique identifier of such seller.
